name: smart-cursor
description: Auto switch IME in C/C++: Chinese inside // comments and double-quoted strings, English elsewhere.

imeContextSwitcher.enabledLanguageIds.description: Language IDs where auto switching is active.

imeContextSwitcher.imSelectPath.description: Path to im-select executable. Relative paths are resolved from extension folder.

imeContextSwitcher.chineseCode.description: Argument passed to im-select for Chinese input.

imeContextSwitcher.englishCode.description: Argument passed to im-select for English input.

imeContextSwitcher.warnOnMissingBinary.description: Show one warning when im-select executable is missing.

imeContextSwitcher.enableInLineComment.description: Switch to Chinese when cursor is after // comment marker.

imeContextSwitcher.enableInDoubleQuotedS.description: Switch to Chinese when cursor is inside double-quoted strings.

imeContextSwitcher.debug.description: Print debug logs into output channel.
